subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Suzuki, 41, who has 2,935 major league hits, took the mound for the first time in the majors, allowing one run and reaching 88 m.p.h. with his fastball during an inning of relief.
snippet: Suzuki, 41, who has 2,935 major league hits, took the mound for the first time in the majors, allowing one run and reaching 88 m.p.h. with his fastball during an inning of relief.
